title: Full Stack Developer
text: Gained hands-on experience in developing and maintaining their freelancing web application. Implemented new features, enhanced UI/UX, and troubleshot issues using React, Firebase, and JavaScript.

title: Internship
text: I was in a team developing an app to assist football coaches in better management of data. We worked on a functional web app with features such as focused football match analysis, practical UI design, and engaging visualizations.

title: International Smart Industry
text: Took courses in various areas, such as Smart Industry Information Systems and digitalization exercises in the International Smart Industry program to enhance my competence.

title: Website Seller
text: Developed and sold WordPress-based websites with 100% positive feedback, completing 178 transactions totaling $16,417.
